mapper.select: SELECT * FROM houses WHERE h_number like #{bulidingName}

update houses
h_number = #{hNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
h_state = #{hState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
h_bulidingName = #{hBulidingname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

h_remarks = #{hRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
b_number = #{bNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where h_id = #{hId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
